title: Implement seek-table compatible format for block offsets
description:
Current block offset API provides (compressed_bit_offset, decompressed_byte_offset) mappings.
  
The seek-table compatible format needs:
- Per-block metadata: (compressed_bit_offset, decompressed_block_size)
- Challenge: we only know block size AFTER decompressing the block
- Options:
  1. Buffer block data and emit size-based format
  2. Two-pass approach: scan for offsets, then decompress
  3. Store cumulative data and compute sizes retroactively

Depends on #1 (block offset tracking)
